DEAR_ENGINEER_MSG: If you are eligible to join as an examiner for one of the two services only, you can follow up on the joining application by attaching the pass certificate for the qualifying session for the service in the required field without the need to attach any document in the field for the other service's course.
PASSWORD_DESC: كلمة المرور لا تقل عن ٨ حروف ولا تزيد عن ٢٥ حرف ولا يقبل النظام كلمات المرور الضعيفة أي يجب ان تتكون من حروف وأرقام
IBAN_MSG: The IBAN consists of 24 characters and starts with two letters, for example SA0000000000000000000000
